ComicInfo.Penciller: Juan Carlos Abraldes Rendo,Mike Hoffman,Nik Poliwko,Rob Moran,Sam Agro,Trevor Denham
ComicInfo.Summary:
Introduced by your host, The Bloke, a Victorian undertaker, who I dress as at conventions to promote the magazine. Bloke's Terrible Tomb of Terror is a homage to the classic horror anthology magazines that we grew up loving.
This is an ongoing, self-published series, with eleven issues currently available and two collected editions. Voted Best Anthology Of 2013 in the Ghastly Awards.
This issue features a story written especially for the magazine by original Warren writer (Creepy, Eerie & Vampirella) Roger McKenzie, a great honor for us with TOMB being a homage to the very magazines that he used to write for.
Writers - Jason 'The Bloke' Crawley, Mike Hoffman, Roger McKenzie, Samuel Agro & Trevor Denham Artwork - Mike Hoffman, Juan Carlos Abraldes Rendo, Nik Poliwko, Rob Moran, Samuel Agro & Trevor Denham
